files.title: Salary Range Reversal Script
files.script: Turn "What are your salary expectations?" into their problem, not yours. A proven script to flip salary questions and get companies to reveal their budget first. Here's what you need to know: Use the "Range Reversal" technique to make them share their budget. Deploy the "Research Response" to show you've done your homework. Lock in the high end with the "Anchoring Acceptance" close. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY14' for the password. Let's level up together!

files.title: The STAR-Plus Method
files.script: Why basic STAR answers get you rejected and how to upgrade them. Transform boring behavioral interview responses into compelling stories that get you hired. Here's what you need to know: Add "Impact" and "Learning" to create STAR-Plus responses. Use the "So What?" test to make your examples memorable. Connect every story back to their specific job requirements. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY15' for the password. Let's level up together!

files.title: Executive Email Formulas
files.script: Stop sounding junior in emails with these C-suite communication patterns. Master the language patterns that make executives take you seriously and respond faster. Here's what you need to know: Use the "Bottom Line Up Front" structure for all important emails. Replace weak phrases with "Executive Language" alternatives. Apply the "3-Click Rule" to get faster responses. Want the full framework? Link in bio. DM me 'DAY16' for the password. Let's level up together!
